title: Stand-Up Comedy - The GameOverGreggy Show Ep. 165 (Pt. 3)
description:
Tim has fallen in love with stand-up comedy.

Thanks to MVMT Watches for sponsoring this episode. Go to http://www.MVMTwatches.com/greggy

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

transcript_chunks.text: Movement Watches was founded on the belief that style shouldn't break the bank. The watchmaker's goal is to change the way consumers think about fashion by offering high-quality, minimalist products at revolutionary prices. With over 500,000 watches sold in more than 160 countries around the world, Movement Watches has solidified itself as the world's fastest-growing watch company. Movement Watches started at $95 and at a department store you're looking at 400 to 500 bucks, buddy. Movement figured out that by selling online they were able to cut out the middleman and retailer markup, providing the best possible price.
